channel.title: Topic Deleted
channel.description: I don't know if this belongs in this section, but does anyone know why my topic (davidscape source) got deleted. I don't want any noobs saying "cuz it sux" or any shit like that. And don't believe that noob that said he deleted it. I just want real answers.

item.title: Topic Deleted
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:39, topic:309336”]Any moderator who deleted a topic due to it being 90% spam shouldn’t have done that at all. It’s easy for us to remove spam en masse. The moderator could have simply split the topic, keeping the original first few posts, then deleting the other 2600~ in one go.

One plus about deleting topics is they are never permanently deleted. They are moved to the Trash Can where they can be collected if a mistake happens. I’ll see if I can try and recover your topic.

Edit: There you go: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,369081.0.html

@whoever deleted it, if it wasn’t deleted due to the flaming/spam, drop me a line. If it was, I hope you didn’t delete anymore topics due to that. If there is a topic with an outstanding amount of spam, just split the topic at the post after the initial topic post. In the move screen, select the second option (split entire topic after and including this post), then delete the new topic. The old topic will retain all of its views and will seem fine. Oh and, don’t forget to post after doing that. It’s a pretty large action to suddenly delete 130 pages of a topic.[/quote]

Thank you Taharok.

In my PMs to MoparIsTheBest, I had also asked why it wasnt split to keep the many PAGES of pure ontopic posts. Those first pages and last pages were on topic and could have been kept using the split feature. Without my topic I decided I was better off. It was getting annoying having to report the leeches on R-S and R-L all of the time. Now I can dedicate my time to coding and helping instead of releasing my server. I deleted the repost you made me (thank you anyway).

Read full topic

item.title: Topic Deleted
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Adding to what Apoc said:

All moderators on this site can lock, sticky, delete, move, merge, and link topics to the calendar. We can also modify any post, remove any post, warn/moderate/mute anyone (seniors + and RSC mods), split topics, merge double posts, ban people (seniors +), modify the censor list (seniors +), access the post reports (juniors, seniors +), and some other things.

Any moderator who deleted a topic due to it being 90% spam shouldn’t have done that at all. It’s easy for us to remove spam en masse. The moderator could have simply split the topic, keeping the original first few posts, then deleting the other 2600~ in one go.

One plus about deleting topics is they are never permanently deleted. They are moved to the Trash Can where they can be collected if a mistake happens. I’ll see if I can try and recover your topic.

Edit: There you go: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,369081.0.html

@whoever deleted it, if it wasn’t deleted due to the flaming/spam, drop me a line. If it was, I hope you didn’t delete anymore topics due to that. If there is a topic with an outstanding amount of spam, just split the topic at the post after the initial topic post. In the move screen, select the second option (split entire topic after and including this post), then delete the new topic. The old topic will retain all of its views and will seem fine. Oh and, don’t forget to post after doing that. It’s a pretty large action to suddenly delete 130 pages of a topic.

Read full topic

Members here are just too ignorant to learn from mistakes and continue until they’ve received a punishment as well…

item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:10, topic:309336”]IIRC Junior Moderators just have the power to delete move sticky and lock, like Rich and Chassy13 and SilentCJ, and Senior Moderators like Newty and maybe Apoc can do that & warn moderate mute and ban (not sure about ban)[/quote]Yep; senior mods can ban and everything.

Junior Moparscape Moderator can:
Delete
Lock
Sticky

Senior Moparscape Moderator can:
Delete
Lock
Sticky
Ban
Warn
Mute
Moderate

item.title: Topic Deleted
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Explisionist:

David, your topic was reported a few days back due to spamming and flaming, and then the last few post were deleted, after that I think a global deleted it because of all of the spamming that was going on.

A mod came into the topic and said to stay on topic. So for the last 2/1.5 weeks its been 100% on topic. The mod could have split the topic so only the last 5-10 pages showed (the 100% on topic stuff)

Even though it wasnt really as off topic as you people say, because in the first aprox 60 pages none of the off topic people were there.

Read full topic
